overview: Nabil (Kamal al-Shennawi) and Farid (Omar Hariri) demand that "sugar" (Abdel Moneim Ibrahim) masquerade as a woman and pretend in front of people that she is the aunt of Farid Fatafeet al-Sukkar, so that they can call their granules home, The trick turns into a problem when Fred's real aunt returns
title: Sukkar Hanem
